RelatedSentence: Mnyamezeli Booi has replaced disgraced former communications minister Dina Pule as number 70 on the ANC 's list of new MPs who will be sworn in on Wednesday , Parliament said on Monday .
Mnyamezeli Booi has replaced disgraced former communications minister Dina Pule as number 70 on the ANC 's list of new MPs who will be sworn in on Wednesday , Parliament said on Monday .
Booi , who served as the chairperson of the portfolio committee on defence and military veterans in the last Parliament , was moved up after Pule withdrew her name last week .
